BLKNUMLA.MX.long_name: BLK Fondeo Gubernamentales MÃ©xico Flexible SA de CV F.I.I.D. A
BLKNUMLA.MX.summary: HORZONT is an investment company that invests primarily in debt instruments of short term and seek to provide competitive performance with respect to performance CETES 28 days. HORZONT invest only in debt instruments denominated in Mexican pesos and / or investment units (UDIs). Such instruments may be at any time, all the time keeping HORZONT lasting less than one year. Instruments may be issued by Mexican or foreign entities, including without limitation those issued by the Federal, State or Municipal in the United States of Mexico, centralized or parastatal entities of the Federal Public Administration, banks, private companies and deposits view.
BLKNUMLA.MX.family: Impulsora de Fondos Banamex SA de CV

GBMGUBLA.MX.short_name: GBM ADMINISTRADORA DE ACTV SA D
GBMGUBLA.MX.long_name: GBM Fondo Corp. Guber. de Liquidez Inmediata SA de CV S.I.I.D.P.M. A
GBMGUBLA.MX.summary: The Fund will aim to invest its resources exclusively in securities issued, guaranteed or accepted by the Federal Government, seeking to obtain a return equal to the rate of cetes 28 days. In order to achieve the objective mentioned above, is preferably selected short-term investments, ie less than one year, or those with a high degree of liquidity. However, the Fund may invest in medium and long term, when based on investment models or perspectives investment committee deems appropriate, with the understanding that the Fund will at all times comply with the short-term rating , in this case, the price volatility of the Fund will increase and there may be important differences with respect to the Fund's performance objective.
GBMGUBLA.MX.family: GBM Administradora de Activos SA de CV
